p: Eriosema laurentii De Wild. widely dispersed in West and Central Africa is used in this area as food and herbal medicine for many purposes such as nasopharyngeal, brain and nervous system affections, pulmonary troubles and venereal diseases ( Burkill, 1985). In Cameroon, the plant is utilized for the treatment of infertility and various gynecological problems ( Ateba et al., 2013).
